## DerivAPI

**Extends DerivAPIBasic**

The main class of the DerivAPI module. This class extends the minimum
functionality provided by the [DerivAPIBasic][21] adding abstract objects
that can be used to read data and interact with the API.

### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][165]** For options details see: [DerivAPIBasic][21]

### Examples

```javascript
// Returns an abstract ticks object
const ticks = api.ticks('R_100');

// Subscribe to updates on the ticks object
ticks.onUpdate().subscribe(console.log);

// Read the last ticks available in the default range
const ticksHistory = ticks.list;

// Read the last 100 ticks until yesterday
const olderHistory = await ticks.history({ count: 100, end: new Date(yesterday) });
```

### tickStream

Provides a ticks stream and a list of available ticks

#### Parameters

-   `options` **([String][166] \| [TicksParam][167])** symbol or a ticks parameter object

Returns **[TickStream][168]** 

### candleStream

Provides a list of available candles with the default granularity

#### Parameters

-   `options` **([String][166] \| [CandlesParam][169])** symbol or a candles parameter object

Returns **[CandleStream][170]** 

### contract

A contract object with latest status and ability to buy/sell

#### Parameters

-   `options` **[ContractsParam][171]** parameters defining the contract

Returns **[Contract][172]** 

### underlying

An underlying object, including contract groups, pip size, etc.

#### Parameters

-   `symbol` **[String][166]** The underlying symbol

Returns **[Underlying][173]** 

### account

An account object, including loginid, balance, contracts, etc.

#### Parameters

-   `token` **[String][166]** Token to create the account with

Returns **[Account][174]** 

### balance

A balance stream

#### Parameters

-   `token` **[String][166]** 

Returns **Balance** 

### transactionStream

A transaction stream

#### Parameters

-   `token` **[String][166]** 

Returns **TransactionStream** 

### assets

Trading assets including multiple underlyings and trading times

Returns **[Assets][175]** 

### changeAccount

Changes the account to the given account

#### Parameters

-   `account`  

## DerivAPIBasic

**Extends DerivAPICalls**

The minimum functionality provided by DerivAPI, provides direct calls to the
API.
`api.cache` is available if you want to use the cached data (see [Cache][31])

### Parameters

-   `options` **[Object][165]**  (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `options.connection` **[WebSocket][176]?** A ready to use connection
    -   `options.endpoint` **[String][166]** API server to connect to (optional, default `'blue.binaryws.com'`)
    -   `options.appId` **[Number][177]** Application ID of the API user (optional, default `1`)
    -   `options.lang` **[String][166]** Language of the API communication (optional, default `'EN'`)

### Examples

```javascript
const apiFromOpenConnection = new DerivAPI({ connection });
const apiFromEndpoint = new DerivAPI({ endpoint: 'ws.binaryws.com', appId: 1234 });
```

### subscribeWithCallback

Subscribe and call the given callback on each response

#### Parameters

-   `request` **[Object][165]** A request object acceptable by the API
-   `callback` **[Function][178]** A callback to call on every new response

#### Examples

```javascript
await api.subscribeWithCallback({ ticks: 'R_100' }, console.log)
```

Returns **[Promise][179]** Resolves to the first response or is rejected with an error

### subscribe

Subscribe to a given request, returns a stream of new responses,
Errors should be handled by the user of the stream

#### Parameters

-   `request` **[Object][165]** A request object acceptable by the API

#### Examples

```javascript
const ticks = api.subscribe({ ticks: 'R_100' });
ticks.subscribe(console.log) // Print every new tick
```

Returns **Observable** An RxJS Observable

### onClose

Reconnects to the API in case of connection error, unless connection is
passed as an argument, in that case reconnecting should be handled in the
API user side.

## Cache

**Extends DerivAPICalls**

Cache - An in-memory cache used to prevent sending redundant requests to the
API

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** API instance to get data that is not cached

### Examples

```javascript
// Read the latest active symbols
const symbols = await api.activeSymbols();

// Read the data from cache if available
const cachedSymbols = await api.cache.activeSymbols();
```

## Underlying

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for an underlying

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 
-   `symbol` **[String][166]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const underlying = await api.underlying('R_100');

const pipSized = underlying.pipSizedValue(123.1);

// Same as api.tickStream(symbol);
const tickStream = underlying.tickStream();

if (underlying.isOpen) await contract.buy();
```

### name

Returns **[Name][181]** The underlying name

### isOpen

Returns **[Boolean][182]** is market open

### isTradingSuspended

Returns **[Boolean][182]** is trading suspended

### pipSize

Returns **[Boolean][182]** pip size

### contractGroups

Returns **[Object][165]** Contract Groups

### pipSizedValue

Returns the pipSized display of the value in string

#### Parameters

-   `value`  

### tickStream

Shortcut for api.tickStream(symbol)

### candleStream

Shortcut for api.candleStream(symbol)

## Name

**Extends Immutable**

A class for name of things

### Parameters

-   `full` **[String][166]** Full form of the name
-   `short` **[String][166]** short form of the name

### Examples

```javascript
const lc = account.landingCompany;

console.log(`Landing Company: ${lc.full}, Short code: ${lc.short}`);
```

### code

Returns **[String][166]** alias for this.short

### shortcode

Returns **[String][166]** alias for this.short

## SpotDurations

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `daily` **DurationRange** 
-   `intraday` **DurationRange** 
-   `tick` **DurationRange** 

## ForwardDurations

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `intraday` **DurationRange** 

## Durations

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `spot` **[SpotDurations][183]** 
-   `forward` **[ForwardDurations][184]** 

## Units

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `spot` **[Name][181]** 
-   `forward` **[Name][181]** 

## Candle

**Extends Immutable**

A container for contract group info

### name

Returns **[String][166]** contract name

### barriers

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Number][177]>** List of barriers

### basis

Returns **[String][166]** 'stake' or 'payout'

### contractTypes

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[String][166]>** List of available contract types

### durations

Returns **[Durations][186]** Durations for spot and forward starting contracts

### units

Returns **[Units][187]** Units for spot and forward starting contracts

### forwardSessions

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[DateRange][188]>** Durations for forward starting contracts

### isForwardStarting

Returns **[Boolean][182]** 

## Candle

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `time` **[CustomDate][189]** 
-   `open` **[MarketValue][190]** 
-   `high` **[MarketValue][190]** 
-   `low` **[MarketValue][190]** 
-   `close` **[MarketValue][190]** 

### name

Returns **[String][166]** contract name

### barriers

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Number][177]>** List of barriers

### basis

Returns **[String][166]** 'stake' or 'payout'

### contractTypes

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[String][166]>** List of available contract types

### durations

Returns **[Durations][186]** Durations for spot and forward starting contracts

### units

Returns **[Units][187]** Units for spot and forward starting contracts

### forwardSessions

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[DateRange][188]>** Durations for forward starting contracts

### isForwardStarting

Returns **[Boolean][182]** 

## Candle

**Extends Immutable**

A wrapper class for Candle

### Parameters

-   `candle` **[Object][165]** 
    -   `candle.epoch` **([Number][177] \| [String][166])** 
    -   `candle.open` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `candle.high` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `candle.low` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `candle.close` **[Number][177]** 
-   `pip` **[Number][177]** 

### name

Returns **[String][166]** contract name

### barriers

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Number][177]>** List of barriers

### basis

Returns **[String][166]** 'stake' or 'payout'

### contractTypes

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[String][166]>** List of available contract types

### durations

Returns **[Durations][186]** Durations for spot and forward starting contracts

### units

Returns **[Units][187]** Units for spot and forward starting contracts

### forwardSessions

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[DateRange][188]>** Durations for forward starting contracts

### isForwardStarting

Returns **[Boolean][182]** 

## DateRange

**Extends Immutable**

A date range class

### Parameters

-   `open` **[CustomDate][189]** 
-   `close` **[CustomDate][189]** 

## Immutable

An abstract class for immutable objects

### Parameters

-   `props` **[Object][165]** A list of properties to add for the immutable object (optional, default `{}`)

### \_data

The main storage for the data in immutable objects

Any access should be done through getters and streams

## Account

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for user accounts

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 
-   `token` **[String][166]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const account = await api.accounts(yourToken);

// Returns the open contracts of this account
const openContracts = account.openContracts();

const siblings = account.siblings;

// Switches the API account to the first sibling
siblings[0].switch();
```

### siblings

Returns **[Account][174]** all the sibling accounts

### openContracts

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Contract][172]>** A list of all open contracts

### closedContracts

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Contract][172]>** A list of all closed contracts

### balance

Returns **Balance** A stream of balance

### loginid

Returns **[String][166]** 

### statusCodes

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[String][166]>** A list of all status codes

### landingCompany

Returns **[Name][181]** Name of the landing company

### apiTokens

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[String][166]>** A list of available API tokens

### transactionStream

Returns **TransactionStream** A stream of transactions \*

### switch

Switches to this account

## Assets

**Extends Immutable**

Abstract class for trading assets

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const assets = await api.assets();

// Get the current open markets
const openMarkets = assets.openMarkets;

const tradingTimes = assets.tradingTimes;
```

### underlyings

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Underlying][173]>** 

### openMarkets

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Underlying][173]>** list of open markets

### tradingTimes

Returns **[Object][165]** 

### tradingDurations

Returns **[Object][165]** 

## CandlesParam

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `granularity` **[Number][177]** Granularity in seconds
-   `range` **[HistoryRange][191]** A chunk of history to return with start and end time
-   `symbol` **[String][166]** Symbol of the candles

## CandleStream

**Extends Stream**

An abstract class for Candles stream returned from [DerivAPI#candleStream][192]

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 
-   `options` **[CandlesParam][169]?** 

### list

An immutable list of Candle objects

#### Examples

```javascript
const candles = candleStream.list;
```

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Candle][193]>** 

### history

Resolves to a list of candles given the range

#### Parameters

-   `range` **[HistoryRange][191]?** 

#### Examples

```javascript
const oldCandles = await candleStream.history({count: 10, end: yesterday})
```

Returns **[Promise][179]&lt;[Array][185]&lt;[Candle][193]>>** 

## HistoryRange

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `start` **([Number][177] \| [Date][194])** An epoch in seconds or a Date object
-   `end` **([Number][177] \| [Date][194])**  An epoch in seconds or a Date object
-   `count` **[Number][177]** Number of ticks returned by history

## TicksParam

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `range` **[HistoryRange][191]** A chunk of history to return with start and end time
-   `symbol` **[String][166]** The ticks symbol

## TickStream

**Extends Stream**

Abstract class for ticks stream returned by the [DerivAPI#tickStream][195]

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 
-   `options` **[TicksParam][167]** 

### list

An immutable list of Tick objects

#### Examples

```javascript
const ticks = tickStream.list;
```

Returns **[Array][185]&lt;[Tick][196]>** 

### history

Resolves to a list of Ticks using the given range

#### Parameters

-   `range` **[HistoryRange][191]?** 

#### Examples

```javascript
const oldTicks = await tickStream.history({count: 10, end: yesterday})
```

Returns **[Promise][179]&lt;[Array][185]&lt;[Tick][196]>>** 

## Stream

**Extends Immutable**

An abstract class for stream objects

### onUpdate

Listen on updates of a stream

#### Parameters

-   `callback` **[Function][178]** 

#### Examples

```javascript
const tickStream = api.tickStream('R_100');

tickStream.onUpdate(console.log);

tickStream.onUpdate().subscribe(console.log);
```

Returns **Observable** 

## Tick

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `time` **[CustomDate][189]** 
-   `quote` **[MarketValue][190]** 
-   `ask` **[MarketValue][190]** 
-   `bid` **[MarketValue][190]** 

## Tick

**Extends Immutable**

A wrapper class for Tick

### Parameters

-   `tick` **[Object][165]** 
    -   `tick.epoch` **([Number][177] \| [String][166])** 
    -   `tick.quote` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `tick.ask` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `tick.bid` **[Number][177]** 
-   `pip` **[Number][177]** 

## CustomDate

**Extends Immutable**

An alternative date object

## MarketValue

**Extends Immutable**

Keeps a market value and pip size

### Parameters

-   `market` **[Object][165]** 
    -   `market.value` **[Number][177]** 
    -   `market.pip` **[Number][177]** 

### pipSize

Returns the pip size

### pipSized

Returns the pipsized value

## ContractsParam

Type: [Object][165]

### Properties

-   `contractType` **[String][166]** 
-   `amount` **[Number][177]** 
-   `barrier` **[String][166]** 
-   `barrier2` **[String][166]** 
-   `dateExpiry` **([Number][177] \| [Date][194])** epoch in seconds or [Date][197]
-   `dateStart` **([Number][177] \| [Date][194])** epoch in seconds or [Date][197]
-   `Currency` **[String][166]?** Default is the account currency
-   `basis` **[String][166]** stake or payout
-   `duration` **([Number][177] \| [String][166])** duration with unit or duration in number
-   `durationUnit` **[String][166]?** duration unit, required if duration is number
-   `productType` **[String][166]?** 'multi_barrier' or 'basic'
-   `account` **[Account][174]?** The account that has this contract

## Contract

**Extends Stream**

Abstract class for contracts

### Parameters

-   `api` **[DerivAPI][180]** 
-   `options` **[ContractsParam][171]** 

### Examples

```javascript
const contract = account.contract({ contractType: 'CALL', ...options })

const buy = await contract.buy();

contract.onUpdate().subscribe(console.log)
```

### buy

Buys this contract

#### Parameters

-   `options` **BuyParam** 
    -   `options.maxPrice`  

Returns **Buy** 

### sell

Sells this contract

#### Parameters

-   `options` **SellParam** 
    -   `options.maxPrice`  

Returns **Sell** 

### isExpired

Returns **[Boolean][182]** 

### status

Returns **[String][166]** Current status of the contract

### sellPrice

Returns **Monetary** Price at which the contract was sold

### buyPrice

Returns **Monetary** Price at which the contract was bought

### type

Returns **[String][166]** contract type

### potentialPayout

Returns **Monetary** The payout value before the contract was sold

### payout

Returns **Monetary** The payout after selling the contract

### contractId

Returns **[Number][177]** The contract ID after purchase

### purchaseTime

Returns **[CustomDate][189]** Time of purchase

### isOpen

Returns **[Boolean][182]**
